reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 151/00: DESIGNATION - CLARINGTON WASTE PROCESSING CENTRE LTD. LANDFILL SITE
reg_info.reg_name_text: DESIGNATION — CLARINGTON WASTE PROCESSING CENTRE LTD. LANDFILL SITE
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 151/00: DESIGNATION - CLARINGTON WASTE PROCESSING CENTRE LTD. LANDFILL SITE
reg_info.act_under: Environmental Assessment Act   Loi sur les évaluations environnementales

content.content: 1. In this Regulation, “Clarington Waste Processing Centre Ltd. Landfill Site” means any landfill site that is located on any part of Lot 11, Concession 2 or any part of Lot 11 or 12, Concession 3, former Township of Clarke in the Municipality of Clarington. O. Reg. 151/00, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. In this Regulation,

“Clarington Waste Processing Centre Ltd. Landfill Site” means any landfill site that is located on any part of Lot 11, Concession 2 or any part of Lot 11 or 12, Concession 3, former Township of Clarke in the Municipality of Clarington. O. Reg. 151/00, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Any enterprise or activity of depositing waste or increasing the area on which waste may be deposited at the Clarington Waste Processing Centre Ltd. Landfill Site is defined as a major commercial or business enterprise or activity and is designated as an undertaking to which the Act applies. O. Reg. 151/00, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Any enterprise or activity of depositing waste or increasing the area on which waste may be deposited at the Clarington Waste Processing Centre Ltd. Landfill Site is defined as a major commercial or business enterprise or activity and is designated as an undertaking to which the Act applies. O. Reg. 151/00, s. 2.
